posts.post_content:
Looking for three cards to finish my team set. In need of:

Kitty Bransfield: Hindu or Sweet Cap 150/649 OP
Sherry Magee (portrait): Piedmont 150
Sherry Magee (with bat): Polar Bear, Piedmont 42, or Cycle 460

Please let me know of anything you might have. Thank you. 

Chris
Magee with bat has been acquired. Still need Magee portrait and Bransfield. Thank you.
